project.name: MapComplete ATM Machines
project.description: This map shows ATMs to withdraw or deposit money

tags.description: The MapComplete theme ATM Machines has a layer ATMs showing features with this tag
The MapComplete theme ATM Machines has a layer ATMs showing features with this tag
The MapComplete theme ATM Machines has a layer ATMs showing features with this tag

The layer 'ATMs allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary (This is only shown if amenity!=bank)

The layer 'ATMs allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary (This is only shown if amenity!=bank)

The layer 'ATMs allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary (This is only shown if amenity!=bank)

The layer 'ATMs allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary (This is only shown if amenity!=bank)
The layer 'ATMs shows images based on the keys image, image:0, image:1,... and  wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary (This is only shown if amenity=bank)
The layer 'ATMs shows images based on the keys image, image:0, image:1,... and  wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary (This is only shown if amenity=bank)
The layer 'ATMs shows images based on the keys image, image:0, image:1,... and  wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary (This is only shown if amenity=bank)
The layer 'ATMs shows images based on the keys image, image:0, image:1,... and  wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary (This is only shown if amenity=bank)
Layer 'ATMs' shows and asks freeform values for key 'brand' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'ATM Machines')
Layer 'ATMs' shows and asks freeform values for key 'operator' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'ATM Machines') (This is only shown if amenity!=bank)
Layer 'ATMs' shows and asks freeform values for key 'opening_hours' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'ATM Machines') (This is only shown if amenity!=bank)
Layer 'ATMs' shows  with a fixed text, namely 'You can withdraw cash from this ATM' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'ATM Machines') Picking this answer will delete the key cash_out.
Layer 'ATMs' shows cash_out=yes with a fixed text, namely 'You can withdraw cash from this ATM' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'ATM Machines')
Layer 'ATMs' shows cash_out=no with a fixed text, namely 'You cannot withdraw cash from this ATM' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'ATM Machines')
Layer 'ATMs' shows  with a fixed text, namely 'You probably cannot deposit cash into this ATM' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'ATM Machines') Picking this answer will delete the key cash_in.
Layer 'ATMs' shows cash_in=yes with a fixed text, namely 'You can deposit cash into this ATM' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'ATM Machines')
Layer 'ATMs' shows cash_in=no with a fixed text, namely 'You cannot deposit cash into this ATM' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'ATM Machines')

Layer 'ATMs' shows speech_output=yes with a fixed text, namely 'This ATM has speech output, usually available through a headphone jack' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'ATM Machines')
Layer 'ATMs' shows speech_output=no with a fixed text, namely 'This ATM does not have speech output' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'ATM Machines')
